name: 0X13

name: 0xFF

name: 0x0
summary: 0x0 is a very short, MBF21 mapset that follows the "n by n" texture limitation gimmick, meaning that every map in the wad uses 0 flats and 0 textures.

name: 0x10c
summary: In a parallel universe where the space race never ended, space travel was gaining popularity amongst corporations and rich individuals.
